name: Instant Pot® Mexican Quinoa
author: Misty Noelle
summary: Mexican quinoa flavored with cumin, smoked paprika, and chili powder. This easy 1-pot meal is made in the Instant Pot® and is the perfect meal for those busy days. Vegan and gluten free! Top with guacamole, salsa, or some sour cream.
ingredients: 1  jalapeno pepper, minced, or to taste
1 (15 ounce) can black beans, drained and rinsed
¾ teaspoon salt, or to taste
1 cup vegetable broth, or as needed
2 tablespoons chopped cilantro, or to taste
directions: Turn on a multi-functional pressure cooker (such as Instant Pot®) and select Saute function
Add oil, onion, jalapeno pepper, and garlic
Saute until onion is softened, about 2 minutes
Add black beans, tomatoes, and corn; mix well
Season with salt, cumin, paprika, chili powder, and black pepper
Add quinoa and toss until well combined
Close and lock the lid; set valve to the sealing position
Select high pressure according to manufacturer's instructions; set timer for 1 minute
Allow 10 to 15 minutes for pressure to build
Release pressure using the natural-release method according to manufacturer's instructions, 10 to 40 minutes
Open the pot and fluff quinoa using a fork
